inbox.inbox:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for a tab showing discussions awaiting mentor action
**UI Location**: Mentoring Inbox (tab for status filter)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the mentoring inbox to filter discussions
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Inbox"
inbox.awaitingStudent:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for a tab showing discussions awaiting student action
**UI Location**: Mentoring Inbox (tab for status filter)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the mentoring inbox to filter discussions
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Awaiting student"
inbox.finished:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for a tab showing finished discussions
**UI Location**: Mentoring Inbox (tab for status filter)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the mentoring inbox to filter discussions
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Finished"
inbox.filterByStudentOrExerciseName:
**Functional Purpose**: Placeholder text for a text input filter
**UI Location**: Mentoring Inbox (search bar)
**When Users See This**: When the text filter input is empty
**Technical Context**: Standard text
**Current English**: "Filter by student or exercise name"
